nodes.bodyText: can this be updated to use the public apis for setting precision.
Sure can, has changed across all the places.
now that custructor for parsing json is removed, could you please add a test which sets different fields using setter api invocation? (basically equivalent of this test using setters)
Now we have this constructor , what is the benefit of having default constructor and setPath() method explicitly .
Good point, I say we remove default constructor, and just keep the constructor which takes String path
what about setPath()? probably that shouldn't be public anymore now as path is set in the constructor.
We can leave the setPath() API as it is, doesn't harm to have the API - and will be in sync with setIndexes() API.
Removed default constructor from includedPath and excludedPath
please add back static import so we don't repeat Assertions.
please have static import so we don't repeat Assertions.
